info.title: Desk365
info.description: Desk365 is a cloud-based modern helpdesk for the Microsoft 365 workplace that lets you deliver outstanding customer service through channels like Microsoft Teams, Email, Web Forms/Widgets and more. Automate repetitive work and save time with Desk365â€™s intuitive, feature-rich web app that comes with a unified inbox to manage all your customer conversations.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Get next 30 tickets from offset value.

parameters.name: updated_since
parameters.description: Get a list of tickets that have shown any activity since the specified time yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss.

parameters.name: include_description
parameters.description: Indicates if description is included or not (default is 'No')

post.summary: When a note is added to a ticket
post.description: When a note is added to a ticket.

Agent.title: Agent
Agent.description: Email address of the agents who added the note separated by comma (If left blank, the trigger will run for all agents)

Content.title: Content
Content.description: String to look for in the note (If left blank, the trigger will run for all notes).

Private.description: Select privacy (If left blank, the trigger will run regardless of Privacy).
Private.title: Private

TicketNumber.description: The unique Id of the ticket.
TicketNumber.title: Ticket Number

Content.description: The content of the reply in HTML.
Content.title: Content

ContentText.description: The content of the reply in plain text.
ContentText.title: Content Text

CreatedBy.title: Created By
CreatedBy.description: Email address of the agent/contact who replied to the ticket.

CreatedOn.description: Reply added timestamp (in format yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss).
CreatedOn.title: Created On

ContactEmail.title: Contact Email
ContactEmail.description: Email address of the ticket requester.

CCEmails.title: CC Emails
CCEmails.description: Email addresses(separated by comma) that are cc'ed with this reply.

ResponseType.description: Indicates if the reply is added by agent or contact('Agent'/'Contact').
ResponseType.title: Response Type

post.summary: When a reply is added to a ticket
post.description: When a reply is added to a ticket.

Content.title: Content
Content.description: String to look for in the reply (If left blank, the trigger will run for all replies).

ResponseType.description: Indicates if the reply is added by agent or contact (If left blank, the trigger will run regardless of response type).
ResponseType.title: Response Type
